snippet: The Day: A new app may help taxi seekers hail cabs, but it is incapable of making the ride a more pleasant enterprise than the tribulation it all too often is.
abstract: The Day: A new app may help taxi seekers hail cabs, but it is incapable of making the ride a more pleasant enterprise than the tribulation it all too often is.

headline.main: Hailing a Cab May Be Easier, but the Ride Remains Unchanged
